topic: Impact of surprise on decision-making in renewable energy investments
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that identifying what would surprise me involves examining and challenging my own assumptions and biases. As a next step, I will actively seek out diverse perspectives and engage with unfamiliar or counterintuitive ideas in my area of interest. metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
